original_text: Instead, you must go to the people of Israel. They are like lost sheep with nobody to take care of them.
korean_text: 오히려 이스라엘 집의 잃어버린 양에게로 가라

sentences.original_text: Instead, you must go to the people of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 너는 이스라엘 백성에게 가야 한다.

sentences.original_text: with nobody to take care of them.
